resource.chars:
X<u>Re. Gunning Fund<\u>. Has the Council 
come to any decision yet? Is it possible 
or necessary to have another meeting of 
the P.C. Ctee before Xmas? Or could 
a vote be taken by letter.
I accept place on Govt. Grant Board B.
HLC
X I understand from 
Sheppard that this matter 
was referred to the members 
present at the last P.C. Cttee 
as a special Cttee.
RH
